ğŸš€ A new Google Meet experience powered by AI & advanced technologies

Features:
ğŸ‘ Flying Chat Messages
Enables you to see chat messages without opening the chat window
ğŸ”˜Adjustable speed
ğŸ”˜Can be turned on and off
ğŸ”˜Mouse over pausing

ğŸ‘ Multitasking Mode
Enables you to multitask without losing the focus. It's exceptional useful when presenting
ğŸ”˜Launch Google Meet session to a split window
ğŸ”˜Multiple split window positions to choose from
ğŸ”˜See participant's videos while presenting

ğŸ‘ Realtime AI Emotion Tracking
Helps you understand the perceived emotion of your current facial expression and be able to gauge the meeting atmosphere in realtime
ğŸ”˜ Tracking your emotion change in realtime
ğŸ”˜ Tracking other users emotion 
ğŸ”˜ Participants multiple emotion ranking

ğŸ‘ Meeting Notes
Enables you to take formatted notes and save to Google Drive
ğŸ”˜ Integration with Google Drive or download to your machine
ğŸ”˜ Load & edit saved notes from Google Drive
ğŸ”˜ Google Doc style editing
ğŸ”˜ Notes panel transparency adjustment

ğŸ‘ Meeting Recording
Gives you the ability to record the meeting anytime you want.
ğŸ”˜ Recorded downloaded to your computer automatically
ğŸ”˜ Choices of recording resolution and audio only option
ğŸ”˜ Pause and resume during recording

ğŸ‘ Meeting Transcription
Captures conversations in the format of text in realtime with timestamp & speaker name
ğŸ”˜ One click to start capturing conversations
ğŸ”˜ Integration with Google Drive or download to your computer
ğŸ”˜ Pause and resume during recording

ğŸ‘ Camera Loop
Stream a recorded video clip to participants in loop
ğŸ”˜ Multiple recording length options
ğŸ”˜ Seemly integration with Google Meet
ğŸ”˜ Reusable recorded video clips

ğŸ‘ Speech Duration Tracking
Shows you who talks the most during the meeting
ğŸ”˜Tracking participants speech duration
ğŸ”˜Realtime ranking chart display
ğŸ”˜Draggable & transparent chart panel

ğŸ‘ Streamer
Stream an image to replace your camera video
ğŸ”˜ Stream whiteboard drawing to Google Meet participants
ğŸ”˜ Support multiple image file format
ğŸ”˜ Drag & drop to upload the image file
ğŸ”˜ Able to set background color for transparent images

ğŸ‘ Meeting Utilities
Provides a list of useful settings that give you a better experience
ğŸ”˜Join automatically without clicking
ğŸ”˜Mute microphone and turn off camera when joining
ğŸ”˜Picture in Picture mode
ğŸ”˜Default profile setting
ğŸ”˜Shared screen zooming
All features of this extension are free to use with a certain amount of usage limit which resets every month. Please sign up for BM PRO at https://beyondmeet.app for unlimited access to all features.


â“How we use your data?

The extension only collects your user's name and email in order to identify you and support functionalities of the extension. 

Our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions can be viewed at https://beyondmeet.app/pages/legal

â“Permission to accessing to your browser history?

The extension stores its configuration/settings in your browser cache which requires the access to your browser history storage, therefore this permission is required. The extension DOES NOT read your browser history other than the extension related configuration/settings.
